plugins.name: AdjustFontSize
plugins.description: Adjust font size with ⌘ + / ⌘ -

plugins.name: Backlight
plugins.description: Highlights the current editing line in Xcode.

plugins.name: BBUFullIssueNavigator
plugins.description: Show all issue content in the issue navigator.

plugins.name: CocoaPods
plugins.description: CocoaPods integration right in Xcode

plugins.name: DerivedData Exterminator
plugins.description: Button for quickly deleting derived data. Makes Xcode happy.

plugins.name: DXXcodeConsoleUnicodePlugin
plugins.description: Convert unicode string to Human-readable in xcode 5+ console.

plugins.name: ESJsonFormat
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in which helps you generate model properties with json easier.

plugins.name: FuzzyAutocomplete
plugins.description: Enables fuzzy matching in Xcode's autocomplete, using the 'Open Quickly' algorithm.

plugins.name: GitDiff
plugins.description: Highlights differences against git repo in Xcode source editor.

plugins.name: HTYCopyIssue
plugins.description: Makes Copy Xcode Issue Description Easily, Support Finding Answers in Google or StackOverflow Directly.

plugins.name: HOStringSense
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to make working with strings less "escaped"

plugins.name: IntelliPaste
plugins.description: IntelliPaste is an Xcode plugin that makes copy-pasting methods and RGB colors easier.

plugins.name: JumpMarks
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for numbered bookmarks. Set bookmarks with ⇧⌥[#], and jump back with ⌥[#] with the respective number.

plugins.name: Miku
plugins.description: Miku is a plugin for Xcode. A copy of atom-miku.

plugins.name: KSImageNamed
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in that provides autocomplete for imageNamed: calls

plugins.name: KZLinkedConsole
plugins.description: Convert console logs containing fileName.extension:XX into clickable links, so you never have to wonder which class logged that message.

plugins.name: LinkedLog
plugins.description: LinkedLog is a Xcode plugin that includes a Xcode PCH header file template that adds the macros `LLog` and `LLogF` and parses their output to link from the console to the corresponding file and line.

plugins.name: MCLog
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for filtering the console area.

plugins.name: OMColorSense
plugins.description: Xcode plugin that makes working with UIColor (and NSColor) more visual.

plugins.name: Peckham
plugins.description: Add #import-s from anywhere in the code.

plugins.name: RTImageAssets
plugins.description: A Xcode plugin to automatically generate @2x, @1x image from @3x image for you, or upscale to @3x from @2x

plugins.name: SCXcodeSwitchExpander
plugins.description: Autocomplete your switch cases

plugins.name: VVDocumenter-Xcode
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in which helps you write Javadoc style documents easier.

plugins.name: VWInstantRun
plugins.description: This plugin let you build & run your selected lines of code in Xcode without run the whole project, you'll have the output instantly in your Xcode console.

plugins.name: XActivatePowerMode
plugins.description: An Xcode plug-in makes activate-power-mode happen in your Xcode.

plugins.name: XAlign
plugins.description: An amazing Xcode plugin to align regular code. It can align Xnything in any way you want.

plugins.name: XCSnippetr
plugins.description: An XCode Plugin to upload code snippets directly into Slack and Gist

plugins.name: XQuit
plugins.description: Xcode plugin which ask to quit Xcode, useful if you quit clumsily.

plugins.name: XToDo
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to collect and list the `TODO`,`FIXME`,`???`,`!!!!`

plugins.name: ZLGotoSandbox
plugins.description: You can quickly enter the iOS simulator Xcode plugin!

plugins.name: ZLXCodeLine
plugins.description: This is a record of the number of lines of code - XcodePlugin.
